name: Chaudron magique
description:
Presentation

Chaudron magique is a narrative video game created at Université de Technologie de Compiègne (UTC) in 2016 as part of the IC06 course (Industrie et conception des jeux vidéo). My group chose to create a game inspired by the choose-your-own-adventure books, in the form of a short game with a comical mood.

Controls

Only the mouse, and the mouse only.

Credits
  • Fabien BOUCAUD : game design, storytelling, programmation
  • Maxime NIVELLE : game design, storytelling
  • Baptiste PERRAUD : art direction, composition, programmation
